name: Goo Seeker
description:
Goo Seeker

It is year 5633. Enemy's defence system damaged mothership over solar system Katrina. 

Ship began to lose precious dark goo which is crew's main source of food.

Goo leaked over one of ours mortal enemy. Fly over vibrant Amir, desert Zeo, volcanic Ak'Sh and flowery Raa'v.

You were chosen to collect our precious cargo. Pick up the right amount of goo and teleport yourself through the Alchemist's portal

to return to the mothership. Just be careful, our enemy's planted deadly bombs all over the map.

The Great Alchemist thinks that the right amount of goo should help us repair our "Space Ark", as well as your ship 

if it gets damaged during mission. Maybe you can check it out.

To steer your ship you must use control arrows. To finish the game you need 7 levels of XP.

Just be aware! The goo might spawn at the edge of the map!

Good luck pilot!
